name: Grumpy Cat
description: This is the newest way of applying  what I hope is an in-browser editor. The outcomes seems smooth. I hope it handles RTL well. I can't seem to do BRs but this could be a really nice feature to implement in our platform. The color change seems to warn I'm running out of space. Or not, as it kept going, so we might be ableto apply restrictions. The real question is what happens if we ultimately need to update many different things in the module, and is it going to be here for the forseeable future?
